channel.title: Hugo Whisper Docs on Raspberry Pi4 Cluster Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo Whisper Docs on Raspberry Pi4 Cluster Docs

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Start here if you are unfamiliar with this documentation.

item.title: Preparing an Image
item.description: Learn how to prepare a bootable, maintainable Ubuntu 18.04.3 (armhf) image for a Raspberry Pi 4.

item.title: cloud-init Bootstrapping
item.description: On first-boot servers receive bootstrap configurations via cloud-init.

item.title: I/O Benchmarks
item.description: Parts sources and benchmark performance results for various USB3 drive configurations.

item.title: Cases and Cooling
item.description: Learn about heatsinks, fans and cases.

item.title: PoE Testing
item.description: Testing performance and suitability of the official Raspberry Pi PoE HAT and 3rd party alternatives.
